data.persona: I guess I shouldn't have thrown those two blokes overboard.  I'm going to end up with a slit throat if I go to jail.  I wonder how much I could get for the Dutchess' brooch?
data.description:
You are in the Along the Pews.
The alter faces west so the rising sun hits the cross just right each morning. The bejeweled cloth that lay over the alter sparkle and the room practically glows.
The beggar is here.

You are carrying a bag, wearing a mask, and wielding a Rock and a knife.

data.short_motivation: I want the beggar to be caught instead of me
data.mid_motivation: I hope to escape the town today
data.long_motivation: I plan to come back in some weeks to steal the bag again

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: steal A bag  from The duchess
